title: Ticket #1540: document submit cmd load_profile
description:
The 7.4.4 version history now has an item: load_profile is now supported by the Unix version of condor_submit when submitting jobs to Windows. Previously, this command was only supported by the Windows version of condor_submit.

This command is undocumented.
remarks: Already documented. Ticket abandoned, as there's nothing to document
creator: smoler
